outputs.output_descr: Project aims to support the national policy dialogue on the socioeconomic implications of climate change and policy options for adaptation at the national level. It will provide economic analysis for decision-makers, as well as to develop national capacity for effective participation at the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change negotiations. Furthermore, the reports aim to provide policy recommendations for the Government for implementation of adaptation measures that will benefit the Human Development of the country.

project_descr: Support the national policy dialogue on the socioeconomic implications of climate change and policy options for adaptation at the national level
